body: that moment when you prefer the story over the sex in a hentais

This is some next level crazy boyfriend shit. Fuck girl who you know is fucking you boss. Buy shit you can't afford to try to 'win' her when she didn't even ask for it. Get upset when girl nags about the subway 'cause I bought you expensive gift lol'. Make a stupid scene and got taped. Lash out at your boss and lose your job. All the girl's fault!!

This is 100% stupid decision on the guy's part and I don't see anything on the girl's part.

Even religious glasses guy had a better reason to be mad because the girl was lying to him in an attempt to marry into money, while this guy choose to do it with that knowledge and fuck his career up cause "fuk dat bic?"
can't sympathize with this guy, he was stupid. hope the next arc is better
the only arc that make sense to me is the teacher arc. That is 100% the girl's fault

I agree with you. This office boy is stupid as fuck. You want to win a girl's heart(slut to be precise) by buying her things with everything you got while she can get it easily the same thing from other men and you wanna complain because of it?
meh this arc is awful, sensei arc was good even the crazy glasses guy make more sense
